messages.subject: Fw: [UnschoolingDiscussion] need help dealing with angry teenager!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kelly, Whats monkey platters?  Sounds interesting.  My 6 yr. old gets really grumpy too when he s hungry.  When I hear him being that way a little pick me
messages.messageBody:
Hi Kelly,
Whats monkey platters? Sounds interesting. My 6 yr. old gets really grumpy too when he's hungry. When I hear him being that way a little pick me up works wonders. He doesnt realize thats what is happening at the time but after a quick bite he's back to himself.
Carol

************************************************************************
I take monkey platters to Duncan (9) and his friends all the time. He's learning to ask for them now---when or *before* he needs them. THAT's what you'll see if you take care of him now.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
